title: Amid crushing floods in China, officials focus not on climate change, but on control
content:
1. Amid crushing floods in China, officials focus not on climate change, but on control  Yahoo News
  2. Zhengzhou residents mourn subway flood victims in China's central Henan province  South China Morning Post
  3. Death toll from China floods rises  CNA
  4. Hyping about foreign journalists being 'attacked' in China shameful: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  5. As China boomed, it didn’t take climate change into account. Now it must.  Moneycontrol.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 中国の大洪水の中、政府は気候変動ではなく、コントロールに焦点を当てています。
在中国巨大的洪水中，官员们关注的不是气候变化，而是控制问题
在中國巨大的洪水中，官員們關注的不是氣候變化，而是控制問題
